subtitle: PROFESSIONAL FULL-STACK DEVELOPER
intro: Hello, my name is Vladislav Rudakevych, I am a professional full-stack developer from Ukraine 🇺🇦. I am building progressive scalable web applications.

Ficus Technologies.resp: Creating and maintaining databases, HTML markup creation, developing API, deploying.
Ficus Technologies.desc:
Ficus Technologies is a software development and IT recruiting company that helps large companies and promising startups bring ideas of any size to life.

The company is trusted by over 250+ companies worldwide and provides expert services for building MVPs, developing software products from scratch, and scaling teams. We form a flexible pipeline that adapts to the needs of the individual client to deliver a result that allows you to achieve all your business goals.

hexCraft.resp: Creating and maintaining servers, game servers, site and launcher.
hexCraft.desc: Hex-Craft is a unique Minecraft project. Main features of this project are services interconnection, gameplay seamlessness and user support as fast as possible.
